Lake Denman

Learn To Type Week Tuesday

Well, I made it. Day two of the “Learn To Type Correctly Week”

Today I decided to use the trusty http://typinggame.com, just as I used yesterday. I tried my hand at typing tests #27 and #24.

It seems that I improved slightly on test #24. If you recall from yesterday, my stats look like this:

Monday
#26 - 70WPM (uncovered)
#26 - 74WPM (covered)
#24 - 9WPM

I was able to improve #24 by just a few WPM.

Tuesday
#24 - 12WPM
#27 - 68WPM

Unfortunately, I seem to have dropped a couple of words on #27. I had trouble sleeping last night and I was feeling groggy! I’m guessing I’ll have some improvement on numbers and stories tomorrow. I’ll probably play some typing games and then take the tests. Check back tomorrow for a report.
